title: New: Anil Sebastian – Closer
content:
As the founder of the London Contemporary Voices Choir, it’s fair to say that Anil Sebastian has seen his fair share of buzz worthy collaborations, with previous experience working with Alt-J, Basement Jaxx and Imogen Heap.

So it’s no surprise to hear that his solo debut, Closer, is one of epic proportions. Sweeping string sections, ethereal backing vocals, and some truly scintillating production; it wouldn’t be out of place on a Hollywood film soundtrack. Check it out below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
